name: Puppy Clicker
description:
( Puppy Clicker is a cute Idle game where you pet your puppy to give them lots of love and attention. )
Note: This game is still in development, but it's very near to completion!
Please give me feedback, so I can make the game a little bit better before the real game comes out Thank You! :) 
and have fun with your new furry friend!
